lead_paragraph: Syrian warplanes resumed their bombardment of the rebel-held Wadi Barada valley northwest of Damascus on Sunday after nearly 24 hours with no air raids, a rebel official and the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group said.
snippet: Syrian warplanes resumed their bombardment of the rebel-held Wadi Barada valley northwest of Damascus on Sunday after nearly 24 hours with no air raids, a rebel official and the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group said....

headline.main: Syrian Warplanes Resume Strikes Near Damascus: Rebel Official, Monitors
headline.print_headline: Syrian Warplanes Resume Strikes Near Damascus: Rebel Official, Monitors
